sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Fab,
  Paper,
  Button,
  Typography,
  Collapse,
  Grid
} from '@mui/material';
import AccessibilityNewIcon from '@mui/icons-material/AccessibilityNew';
import ContrastIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Tonality';
import PsychologyIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Psychology';
import TextFieldsIcon from '@mui/icons-material/TextFields';
import AddIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Add';
import RemoveIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Remove';
import ImageIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Image';
import AnimationIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MotionPhotosOff';
import LinkIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Link';
import MouseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Mouse';
import { AccessibilityContext } from '../../context/AccessibilityContext';

export default function AccessibilityFAB() {
  const [open, setOpen] = useState(false);
  const [sobreBanner, setSobreBanner] = useState(true);

  const {
    altoContraste,
    modoDislexia,
    tamañoTexto,
    toggleContraste,
    toggleDislexia,
    aumentarTexto,
    disminuirTexto,
    ocultarImágenes,
    resaltarEnlaces,
    detenerAnimaciones,
    toggleOcultarImágenes,
    toggleResaltarEnlaces,
    toggleAnimaciones,
    guiaVisual,
    toggleGuiaVisual
  } = useContext(AccessibilityContext);

  useEffect(() => {
    const handleScroll = () => {
      setSobreBanner(window.scrollY < 600);
    };
    window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
    handleScroll();
    return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
  }, []);

  const estiloBoton = sobreBanner
    ? {
        background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1976d2, #7e57c2)',
        color: '#fff',
        boxShadow: '0 8px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.4)',
        width: 64,
        height: 64,
        borderRadius: '50%',
        '&:hover': {
          transform: 'scale(1.1)',
          boxShadow: '0 12px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)'
        },
        transition: 'all 0.3s ease-in-out'
      }
    : {
        backgroundColor: '#ffffffee',
        color: '#1976d2',
        border: '2px solid #1976d2',
        boxShadow: '0 8px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.35)',
        width: 64,
        height: 64,
        borderRadius: '16px',
        backdropFilter: 'blur(6px)',
        '&:hover': {
          backgroundColor: '#ffffff',
          transform: 'scale(1.1)',
          boxShadow: '0 12px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)'
        },
        transition: 'all 0.3s ease-in-out'
      };

  const tarjetaStyle = {
    p: 2,
    backgroundColor: '#f3f6f9',
    borderRadius: 3,
    border: '1px solid #d0d7de',
    boxShadow: '0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)',
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    alignItems: 'center',
    textAlign: 'center',
    gap: 1,
    minHeight: 140,
    transition: 'all 0.2s ease-in-out',
    '&:hover': {
      boxShadow: '0 8px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.12)',
      transform: 'scale(1.02)'
    }
  };

  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        position: 'fixed',
        bottom: 24,
        right: 24,
        zIndex: 1300,
        display: 'flex',
        flexDirection: 'column',
        alignItems: 'flex-end'
      }}
    >
      <Collapse in={open}>
        <Paper
          elevation={10}
          sx={{
            mb: 2,
            p: 3,
            borderRadius: '20px',
            backgroundColor: '#f3f6f9',
            boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)',
            maxWidth: 380,
            maxHeight: 600,
            overflowY: 'auto'
          }}
        >
          <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ fontWeight: 700, color: '#1976d2', mb: 2 }}>
            ⚙️ Opciones de accesibilidad
          </Typography>

          <Grid container spacing={2}>
            {/* Visual */}
            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle}>
                <ContrastIcon fontSize="large" sx={{ color: '#1976d2' }} />
                <Typography variant="subtitle2" sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                  Contraste
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary">
                  Mejora la visibilidad general
                </Typography>
                <Button
                  variant="contained"
                  size="small"
                  color={altoContraste ? 'secondary' : 'primary'}
                  onClick={toggleContraste}
                >
                  {altoContraste ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}
                </Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle}>
                <PsychologyIcon fontSize="large" sx={{ color: '#1976d2' }} />
                <Typography variant="subtitle2" sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                  Dislexia
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary">
                  Tipografía más legible
                </Typography>
                <Button
                  variant="contained"
                  size="small"
                  color={modoDislexia ? 'secondary' : 'primary'}
                  onClick={toggleDislexia}
                >
                  {modoDislexia ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}
                </Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            {/* Texto */}
            <Grid item xs={12}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle}>
                <TextFieldsIcon fontSize="large" sx={{ color: '#1976d2' }} />
                <Typography variant="subtitle2" sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                  Tamaño de texto
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary">
                  Ajusta el contenido a tu comodidad
                </Typography>
                <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 1 }}>
                  <Button variant="outlined" size="small" onClick={disminuirTexto}>
                    <RemoveIcon />
                  </Button>
                  <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ alignSelf: 'center' }}>
                    {Math.round(tamañoTexto * 100)}%
                  </Typography>
                  <Button variant="outlined" size="small" onClick={aumentarTexto}>
                    <AddIcon />
                  </Button>
                </Box>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            {/* Funciones extra */}
            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle}>
                <ImageIcon fontSize="large" sx={{ color: '#1976d2' }} />
                <Typography variant="subtitle2" sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                  Ocultar imágenes
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary">
                  Reduce distracciones visuales
                </Typography>
                <Button
                  variant="outlined"
                  size="small"
                  color={ocultarImágenes ? 'secondary' : 'primary'}
                  onClick={toggleOcultarImágenes}
                >
                  {ocultarImágenes ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}
                </Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle}>
                <LinkIcon fontSize="large" sx={{ color: '#1976d2' }} />
                <Typography variant="subtitle2" sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                  Resaltar enlaces
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary">
                  Mejora navegación
                </Typography>
                <Button
                  variant="outlined"
                  size="small"
                  color={resaltarEnlaces ? 'secondary' : 'primary'}
                  onClick={toggleResaltarEnlaces}
                >
                  {resaltarEnlaces ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}
                </Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
              <Box sx={tarjetaStyle}>
                <AnimationIcon fontSize="large" sx={{ color: '#1976d2' }} />
                <Typography variant="subtitle2" sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                  Animaciones
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary">
                  Evita movimientos innecesarios
                </Typography>
                                <Button
                  variant="outlined"
                  size="small"
                  color={detenerAnimaciones ? 'secondary' : 'primary'}
                  onClick={toggleAnimaciones}
                >
                  {detenerAnimaciones ? 'Desactivar' : 'Detener'}
                </Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={6}>
  <Box sx={tarjetaStyle}>
    <MouseIcon fontSize="large" sx={{ color: '#1976d2' }} />
    <Typography variant="subtitle2" sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
      Guía visual
    </Typography>
    <Typography variant="caption" color="text.secondary">
      Sigue el cursor con un foco visible
    </Typography>
    <Button
      variant="outlined"
      size="small"
      color={guiaVisual ? 'secondary' : 'primary'}
      onClick={toggleGuiaVisual}
    >
      {guiaVisual ? 'Desactivar' : 'Activar'}
    </Button>
  </Box>
</Grid>

          </Grid>
        </Paper>
      </Collapse>

      <Fab onClick={() => setOpen((prev) => !prev)} aria-label="Accesibilidad" sx={estiloBoton}>
        <AccessibilityNewIcon fontSize="large" />
      </Fab>
    </Box>
  );
}
